About Us

  • Home
  • About Us

BRAND

Established in 1916, kalimark, has began as a humble endeavor crafting beverages that soon became unanimous with quality and taste with over a century of commitment to excellence. Our journey embodies a rich legacy of crafting iconic refreshments loved by million worldwide

BUILT

A fully automated state of the art facility to table out all our manufacturing requirements, greatly assists in the profound success of brand kalimark. Advanced tech on par with international players, Kalimark has left no stone unturned to ensure an optimum operational performance and a premium quality drink. Constantly in lieu with market trends, Kalimark strives to provide the best that there is.

Kalimark's Engine of Excellence: Our Exceptional Team

Crafting Success, One Professional at a Time
Kalimark’s journey to success is intricately woven with the skills and experiences of our exceptional team. We don’t just hire employees; we invest in the architects of our triumph.
The Heartbeat of Innovation: Our Stellar Professionals
Step into the world of Kalimark, where innovation is not just a buzzword; it’s a way of life. Our team of seasoned professionals forms the core of this creative powerhouse, bringing fresh ideas to the table and turning them into reality.
Unveiling the Heroes: Kalimark’s Pride
Meet the unsung heroes behind the scenes—the individuals who make Kalimark shine. We take immense pride in our team, boasting diverse talents that synergize to create a symphony of success. Their dedication is the reason Kalimark stands tall in the industry.
Crafting Quality, Nurturing Talent
At Kalimark, we understand the profound connection between a talented team and exceptional products. Our commitment to nurturing talent ensures that every bottle of Kalimark bears the mark of excellence, a testament to the collective skill and passion of our workforce.
Beyond Products: Celebrating People
Kalimark is more than a brand; it’s a community of like-minded individuals working towards a common goal. Join us in celebrating not just our products, but the incredible individuals who bring them to life.
Explore the Kalimark Experience
Discover the magic that happens when a dedicated team comes together to redefine industry standards. Kalimark invites you to experience the difference that passion, expertise, and commitment can make.

IDENTITY

Kalimark, a beacon since 1916, embarked on a luminous journey from Virudhupatti, now Virudhunagar. The brand’s roots deepened, and its popularity soared. The emblem transcended borders, casting a vibrant glow across the globe.
The torch was passed to the younger generation, propelling the business to new heights. In 1959, cities like Chennai, Tirunelveli, and Madurai savored the renowned Bovonto, a soft beverage that laid the foundation for Kalimark’s soft drink supremacy. Since then, Kalimark has stood firm, with Bovonto marking a pivotal moment in its history.
The journey persists, with grandsons and great-grandsons steering Kalimark to new frontiers across Tamil Nadu. Over the past decade, Kalimark has amassed numerous achievements, securing a robust market presence. With a state-of-the-art manufacturing unit, Kalimark consistently delivers remarkable output. The PET bottles emanating from the plant not only quench thirst but also foster trust among customers. The saga continues, with Kalimark leaving an indelible mark on the beverage landscape.

OUR LEADERSHIP TEAM

At Kalimark, our success is driven by a dynamic and visionary leadership team committed to excellence, innovation, and fostering a culture of collaboration. Meet the individuals who guide us towards new horizons and lead by example.

Leadership Philosophy

Innovation

We believe in pushing boundaries and embracing creativity to stay ahead of the curve. Our leadership team encourages a culture of innovation, where every idea is valued and contributes to our continuous growth.

Collaboration

Teamwork is at the heart of our success. Our leaders understand the power of collaboration and strive to create an environment where diverse perspectives come together to achieve common goals.

Integrity

At Kalimark, integrity is non-negotiable. Our leaders uphold the highest ethical standards, ensuring that every decision and action reflects our commitment to honesty, transparency, and accountability.

MEET OUR LEADERS

Our leadership team is dedicated to cultivating a culture of excellence at every level of the organization. By setting high standards and providing guidance, they empower our teams to deliver exceptional products and services to our customers.

Tony

VISION

Empowering Lives, Inspiring Joy
At Kalimark, our vision is to be a beacon of inspiration, enriching lives through our innovative and sustainable solutions. We strive to create a world where joy is not just a moment, but a way of life. By pushing the boundaries of possibility, we aspire to leave a lasting legacy of positive impact on individuals, communities, and the planet.

MISSION

Crafting Tomorrow, Today
Our mission at Kalimark is to pioneer transformative solutions that redefine industries and elevate experiences. We are dedicated to continuous innovation, ensuring that our products and services not only meet but exceed the evolving needs of our customers. Through a commitment to excellence, sustainability, and social responsibility, we aim to shape a brighter future for generations to come.

VISION & MISSION

Vision

“V” Inspire Success

Values

Respect for the individuals

Mission

  • Zero defect, high quality products to people
  • Enriching life of our employees
  • Creating employment opportunity in possible area
  • Enhancing shareholders value by sustained business growth

BUSINESS CORE VALUES

Innovation

Unleashing Creative Excellence

Innovation is the lifeblood of Kalimark. We foster a culture that celebrates and encourages bold ideas, pushing the boundaries of what is possible. By embracing change and staying ahead of the curve, we drive progress and create value for our customers and partners.

Integrity

Guided by Ethics, Grounded in Transparency

Integrity is the cornerstone of our business. We conduct ourselves with the highest ethical standards, ensuring transparency in all our interactions. Trust is earned through honesty, accountability, and a steadfast commitment to doing what is right.

Collaboration

One Team, One Vision

Collaboration is at the heart of our success. We believe in the power of unity and diverse perspectives, recognizing that our collective strength is greater than the sum of individual efforts. Together, we foster an environment that encourages open communication, mutual respect, and shared success.

Customer-Centric

Exceeding Expectations, Every Time

Our customers are at the center of everything we do. We are committed to understanding their needs, exceeding their expectations, and delivering products and services of the highest quality. Customer satisfaction is not just a goal; it's a measure of our success.

Sustainability

Guardians of Tomorrow

As stewards of the planet, we are committed to sustainable practices that minimize our environmental footprint. From responsible sourcing to eco-friendly manufacturing, we strive to contribute to a healthier, more sustainable world for current and future generations.

Join us on our journey as we live out our vision, embody our mission, and uphold our core values. Together, we are Kalimark - shaping a future defined by innovation, integrity, collaboration, customer-centricity, and sustainability.
